title: Please Help!
body:
I reached Level 50 and unpon opening the special Lv. 50 capsule , i received the 2014 snowdown dragon slayer poro Icon and it was automatically added to my selection of icons; however my new icon has not appeared as an available icon in my selection pool. This must be a bug and i was hoping i could get some help in resolving this issue
- Thank you!!

replies.body: Hey I verified the icon was successfully added to the account!  It's an older icon so you may need to scroll down a bit to find it.  It's not sorted by date obtained.  Let me know if that clears things up!
